title: Ranked game got disbanded and can't create a new ranked game?
body:
I dont see any mentioning about server maintenance. Why is this happening? Did I unintendedly dodge the game? 

I can only select Normal-Blind mode and other game modes.

replies.body: I do believe there was some scheduled server maintenance last night which would have brought down the ranked queues beforehand. We do this to make sure that no ranked games get interrupted when the servers do come down.
